long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I made some improvements to my Browser Action extension and a user request came in to change the color of the page to a specific color. So I added a color picker and an action to be able to change the background color of the current page. The color can be saved to the browser settings. Here is an example of the extension in action.
